title: FPS freezes (In-Game & Client itself, New + Old), Audio cutting out In-Game as well.
body: Me and a lot of people I have been playing with, random allies/opponents and friends are experiencing this. Just hoping this gets made aware of. Not sure about them but it just started for me this patch. Yesterday to be exact.

replies.body:
I've seen this a few times here on H&S lately. It seems a batch of Windows updates that recently went out have been re-enabling a problem feature called *Game DVR*, which lies inside the Windows Xbox Game Bar. I recommend following the steps on [**this post**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update) in order to resolve this. 

If this worked, please let me know and share it with your friends if they're experiencing this as well.
